mapper.insert: insert into ec_cust_habitavo (cust_no, habit_avoc_cd, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat) values (#{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{habitAvocCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ec_cust_habitavo set create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and habit_avoc_cd = #{habitAvocCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select cust_no, habit_avoc_cd, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from ec_cust_habitavo

select a.cust_no, a.habit_avoc_cd, b.habit_avoc_val, a.create_date, a.create_time, a.create_user, a.update_date, a.update_time, a.update_user, a.time_stamp, a.rec_stat from ec_cust_habitavo a, ec_habit_avoc b where a.habit_avoc_cd = b.habit_avoc_cd and a.cust_no = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.rec_stat = '0' and b.rec_stat = '0'
